triviaMaze.room

Class RoomLink

  • java.lang.Object
    • triviaMaze.room.RoomLink
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IRoomLink

    public class RoomLink
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRoomLink
    An implementation of IRoomLink which holds the state between rooms
    Author:
    Jacob Erdman, Randy Heckard
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
